txt.en:
'This Boar-tribe is dangerous and needs to be dealt with swiftly. I am afraid that if they are not stopped soon, they will only grow stronger.

'Our numbers here in Eastfold are low and reinforcements will not be coming anytime soon.

'That appears to be Cúthing approaching... he is the Thane's son. We should make sure that he is not too badly injured.'

'The hunting party was small, and we were overtaken quickly by the Orcs. I managed to escape, but I cannot say the same for the rest of my party.

'These Orcs appear to be living in tunnels within the White Mountains. You may be correct regarding their origin... they could well be the remnant of King Folca's crusade to destroy the Orcs of the White Mountains.

'If this is true, they have been biding their time.'
Meregyth stands near the Mead Hall of Beaconwatch.\n\nYou should speak with Meregyth concerning Cúthing's report.
'We know where they live and perhaps the connexion to King Folca.\n\n'Let me consider this for a moment.'
An injured Cúthing approaches.\n\nMeregyth wants you to speak with Cúthing.
